comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: More about the photographer, Herman Mishkin: broadway.cas.sc.edu/index.php?action=showPhotographer&amp... photogsfinder.com/index.php?title=Herman_Mishkin commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Herman_Mishkin Other Mishkin Studio opera pictures published in the New York Times, including more of Constantino in this December, 1908 New York Times Article: select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60A16FD3A5A1773... Other Mishkin Studio pictures of performing artists in the Bain collection: www.flickr.com/search/?w=8623220@N02&q=mishkin Constantino was in the news in January, 1914 in two court cases, one in which he was sued for breach of promise (to marry), and another by Oscar Hammerstein seeking to stop him from singing in Boston and for breach of contract. query.nytimes.com/search/sitesearch/#/florencio+constanti...
